name: Galactic Journey (Marine Millot)
description:
Collect enought energy to reboot the hyperdrive starship and thus escape from the Sun gravitational attraction !

Galatic Journey is a 3D first person survival, in which you must fix breakdowns throughout the spacecraft. To do so, you have to cooperate with your team* to distribute yourselves cleverly to suit the different tasks in rooms.
Beware of the AI that will try to thwart your plans by sabotaging the ship ! 

*Disclaimer : you have to be 3 players to play in good conditions.

PLAYABLE CHARACTER

Don't underestimate this tiny robot, when it works together with its fellows, everything becomes possible.

CONTROLS* KEYBOARD AND MOUSE

GAMEPAD

*⚠ As the game is primarily designed for keyboard and mouse, notice that joystick controls aren't available in menus.

CREDITS

This game was made with Unreal Engine by a team of 7 students from Ynov Bordeaux.
We were having 22 weeks (at a rate of 1 day and half per week) to do this project.

DESIGNER

Léo RANDON - Game & sound designer

ARTISTS

Elioth LEROUX - Character (modeling, rigging/skinning, animation)
Marine MILLOT - Environment (modeling, optimisation, UV, level art, VFX)
Alexis VONDERSCHER - Environment (blockout, texturing, foliage, lighting)

PROGRAMMERS

Jason COLTIER - Artificial Intelligence + UI/UX + interactions
Jean-Baptiste CURVAT - Programmer C++
Gaultier DESHAYES - Player controller character

COMPOSER

Needlewin - Music composer (Website & Spotify)
